alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:57PM MDT until July 20 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 256 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boncarbo, or 13 miles west of Trinidad, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, 60 mph wind gusts, and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Cokedale, Starkville and Boncarbo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
